author: Sergio Rame
title: Coronavirus, il Cdm straordinario: il piano per fermare l'epidemia - il Giornale
description: Vertice fiume alla Protezione civile. Conte: "Al primo posto c'è la tutela della salute dei cittadini". Varate misure speciali: dal contenimento degli spostamenti allo stop delle attività lavorative
content: Nel giorno più duro per il Paese dall'esplosione di contagi da coronavirus, il governo elabora un primo piano per provare a contrastare la pandemia che nelle ultime ore ha già fatto due vittime e ha contagiato oltre settanta italiani. In un Consiglio dei mini… [+4567 chars]

author: Sarah Al-Arshani
title: Coronavirus: Where novel virus could be a threat according to experts - Business Insider - Business Insider
description: COVID-19 has been found in 30 countries, and as it continues to spread, experts told Business Insider many countries lack the capacity to contain it.
content:
While China is reporting a dip in new COVID-19 infections, cases of the novel virus are still being discovered in new countries, many of which have no ties to the epicenter of the outbreak.  
Four people died from the virus in Iran in the past few days, a fo… [+6083 chars]

author: RFI
title: Coronavirus: what we know and what we don't - RFI
content:
Paris (AFP)
Researchers want to know everything about the latest coronavirus, from its mortality rate to its origins, incubation period and much more, and they still have blanks to fill in.
- Mortality rate? -
COVID-19, as the disease is known, is more let… [+4040 chars]

author: hermes
title: Wuhan woman with no symptoms infected five relatives: Study - The Straits Times
description: WUHAN • A 20-year-old Chinese woman from Wuhan, the epicentre of the coronavirus outbreak, travelled 675km north to Anyang where she infected five relatives, without ever showing signs of infection, Chinese scientists reported on Friday, offering new evidence…
content: WUHAN A 20-year-old Chinese woman from Wuhan, the epicentre of the coronavirus outbreak, travelled 675km north to Anyang where she infected five relatives, without ever showing signs of infection, Chinese scientists reported on Friday, offering new evidence t… [+1938 chars]

author: Adriana Bazzi
title: Coronavirus: come gestire la quarantena del Covid 19 in famiglia, lavarsi spesso le mani e letti separati - Corriere della Sera
description: Le regole dell’isolamento domiciliare: meglio allontanare anziani e bambini, usare fazzoletti di carta, disinfettare le superfici degli ambienti domestici con candeggina
content: Non chiamiamola più «quarantena», come si faceva nel Medioevo, ma «isolamento domiciliare». L’idea di fondo è la stessa: confinare le persone, che sono venute a contatto con un germe contagioso e potrebbero trasmetterlo ad altre, in strutture protette (come è… [+1971 chars]
